text: This is a list of official cities in Indonesia. They are organized by major island or region. The population numbers are based on data from 2005. ==Statistics== Island Group City Population Java Bandung 2,394,873 Java Batu 190,184 Java Bekasi 2,334,871 Java Blitar 131,968 Java Bogor 950,334
